1.<speed=0>|第<%nM_EVENT_NUMBER>回段位戦は 終了いたし: <speed=0>The No. <%dM_EVENT_NUMBER> Ranked Championship has ended.|Please go speak with Tycoon Club Member Pugol|in Luckland.<end>

2.<speed=0>|ただいま 大富豪決定戦 開催中のため|段位戦は参加できません: <speed=0>The Tycoon Playoffs are now underway, so you|can't participate in Ranked.<end>

3.<speed=0>|２人以上のパーティを 組んでいないと|仲間と 対戦できません: <speed=0>Your party must have at least 2 members to|play a Party Battle.<end>

4.仲間を勧誘中のため|ひとりで練習できません。|<bw_break>: Can't play alone since you still have|unanswered party invites.<bw_break>

5.<speed=0>|仲間とパーティを 組んでいるため|ひとりで 練習できません。: <speed=0>You are currently in a party, so you|cannot practice alone.<end>

6.<speed=0>|段位戦の 対戦相手を探します。|表示されているルールで ３ゲ: <speed=0>|Search for players for a Ranked battle with|the current rules shown?|<yesno><close>

7.<speed=0>|段位戦のルールが 切り替わりました。|もう一度 やり直してく: <speed=0>The Ranked rules have changed. Please try|again.<end>

8.<speed=0>|このルールで 仲間を誘います。|<%nM_NUM_GAME>: <speed=0>Play <%dM_NUM_GAME> game(s) using these rules with your|current party? Any empty spots will be filled|by computer controlled opponents.|<yesno><close>

9.<speed=0>|このルールで ひとりで練習します。|自動操作の対戦相手と <: <speed=0>Play <%dM_NUM_GAME> game(s) using these rules by yourself?|You will play against computer controlled|opponents.<yesno><close>

10.<speed=0>|大富豪の 基本ルールについて|確認することが できます。|<: <speed=0>Here you can review Tycoon's basic rules.<break>

11.<speed=0>|大富豪の対戦のうち|『段位戦』『なかま対戦』『ひとりで練習』:
|This will explain "Ranked", "Party Battle",|and "Playing Alone" for Tycoon.|
|"Ranked" matches you with 3 other players|and you will play with the Ranked Rules which|change daily.|
|In "Ranked", you will play 3 games and|compete for the highest number of points.|
|"Party Battle" lets you play with friends|and you'll play with the party leader's|chosen rules.|
|However, please be aware that you'll earn less|Card Points in "Party Battle" than in|"Ranked".|
|When you have less than 4 players for a|"Party Battle", the empty spots will be filled|by computer controlled opponents.|
|In "Practice Alone", you can choose your own|rules, but you won't receive any Card Points.|
|In "Party Battle" and "Practice Alone", you|can choose the amount of games to play up|to 4 total.|
|Play "Ranked" to test your own skills, and|play "Party Battle" to enjoy casual games|with your friends.|

12.<speed=0>|各プレイヤーには 階級があり|１ゲーム目は 全員「平民」から:
Each player has a rank, and the first game|begins with all commoners... In the first|game, the player with the three of diamonds|
|is the parent and starts the game. In turn,|each player must play a card that is stronger|than the card on the board, and when all the|
|cards in their hand are played, they win. In|the next game, the player's rank is|determined by the order of their winnings:|
|millionaire, rich, poor, and poorest. In the|second game, before the game begins, you must|exchange cards with a player of another rank.|
|The richest player trades two cards from his|hand for the poorest player's two best cards.|The richest player trades a card from his|
|hand for the poorest player's best card. From|the second game onwards, the poorest player|is the parent and starts the game. When all|
|the games are over, the final ranking is|determined by the sum of the points won.

13.<speed=0>|自分のターンでは カードを出さずに|パスすることもできます。:
On your turn, you can pass without playing a|card... If you play a card, and everyone else|passes, the cards in the field are discarded.|
|When the field runs out, you become the|parent, and you can play a new card of your|choice... You can pass as many times as you|
|like, but you can't pass on the first turn|when you're the parent...

14.<speed=0>|自分のターンの時や カードを選ぶ時の|制限時間は <%nM_:
When it's your turn, or when you choose a|card, you have a time limit of|<%nM_timelimit>... When the time limit|
|expires, the game automatically passes... If|you are the parent and the time limit|expires, your card is automatically played...|
|If you miss the time limit twice in a row,|you'll be penalized and you'll be out of the|game.

15.<speed=0>|カードの強さは 弱い順に並べると|３ ４ ５ ６ ７ ８ ９:
The cards, listed in order of strength from|weakest to strongest, are three, four, five,|six, seven, eight, nine. 10, J, Q, K, A, 2,|
|Joker... Now, if the cards are in different|suits (diamonds, spades, hearts, clubs), but|they have the same number, they have the same|
|strength. However, the Joker can be used as|the strongest card, even if its strength is|reversed by a revolution or an 11-back...

16.<speed=0>|場に１枚 カードが出ている時|より強いカードを １枚出します:
When there is a card in the field, you can|play a stronger card... When there are no|cards in the field, you can play multiple|
|cards of the same number at the same time...|If more than one card is played, the player|on the next turn can only play the same|
|number of cards... The Joker can be used in|place of any other card when more than one|card is played at the same time...

17.<speed=0>|大富豪には 基本ルールのほかに|追加ルールがあります。|<b: <speed=0>In addition to the basic rules, there are|additional rules... Each of these rules can|be found in the "Custom Rules" section...<end>

18.<speed=0>|報酬を 受け取る場合は|娯楽島ラッカランの 大富豪協会員プゴ: <speed=0>|To receive your rewards, please speak to|Tycoon Club Member Pugol in Luckland.|<end>

19.<speed=0>|仲間とパーティを 組んでいるため|段位戦に 参加できません。: <speed=0>You can't play a Ranked battle because|you are in a party.<end>

20.<speed=0>|何ゲーム遊びますか？|２ゲーム目からは ゲームを始める前に|: <speed=0>Play how many games? Starting from Game 2, you|can exchange cards with other players with|a different rank than you.|<select_se_off>|1 Game|2 Games|3 Games|4 Games|<select_end><close>

21.<speed=0>|大富豪決定戦に エントリーされていません。|娯楽島ラッカラン: <speed=0>You aren't registered for the Tycoon|Playoffs. Go speak to Tycoon Club Member|Pugol in Luckland.<end>

22.<speed=0>|仲間とパーティを 組んでいるため|大富豪決定戦に 参加できま: <speed=0>You can't participate in the Tycoon Playoffs|because you're in a party.<end>

23.<speed=0>|大富豪決定戦の 対戦相手を探します。|表示されているルールで: <speed=0>Search for opponents for the Tycoon Playoffs?|You'll play 3 games using the rules shown.|<yesno><close>
